      • get

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> get​(CFADataBase.Table __table)
        Gets the menu in a dictionary of key-value pairs, where key = primary key ex. {{"menu_item", "ChickFil-A Chicken Sandwich"}, ... }
        Parameters:
        __table - The desired table to query
        Returns:
        Dictionary of entries in the requested table (dictionaries)

      • getNewestInv

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> getNewestInv()
        Gets the inventory for each item that is in the most recent day entered into the daily_inventory table.
        Returns:
        Table of the most recent inventory report. (Dictionary of Dictionaries)

      • getRestockReport

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> getRestockReport()
        Gets a collection of items whose current quantity is lower than the specified threshold. Presents the manager with a view of all items that are currently low and in need of restocking.
        Returns:
        Table of current low items that need restocking. (Dictionary of Dictionaries)

      • getExcessReport

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> getExcessReport​(java.time.LocalDate date)
        Gets a collection of items who have only been selling <10% of their starting quantity each day. Presents the manager with a table of items which are retaining extreme excess at the end of each specified day.
        Parameters:
        date - Which day to generate the excess report for
        Returns:
        Table of the items with excess. (Dictionary of Dictionaries)

      • getSalesReport

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> getSalesReport​(java.lang.String start_date,
                                                                                                                   java.lang.String end_date)

      • getSalesReport

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> getSalesReport​(java.lang.String start_date,
                                                                                                                   java.lang.String end_date,
                                                                                                                   java.lang.String start_time,
                                                                                                                   java.lang.String end_time)
        Generates a sales report given starting date and time, and ending date and time.
        Parameters:
        start_date - Date to start the sales report on
        end_date - Date to end the sales report on
        start_time - Time of day during the `start_date` to start the report
        end_time - Time of day during the `end_date` to end the report
        Returns:
        Sales report in table format (Dictionary of Dictionaries)

      • newOrder

        public boolean newOrder​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ordered_items,
                        java.lang.String customer_name,
                        int kiosk_id,
                        int order_num)
        Used to execute an insertion query from our database (CREATE, UPDATE, INSERT, etc.).
        Parameters:
        ordered_items - List of "menu_item" strings, ie the name of the item to order
        customer_name - Customer Name
        kiosk_id - Integer ID of the kiosk that created the order
        order_num - The number of the order being created
        Returns:
        Boolean to represent insertion sucess or failure.
